elements.text:
You have a lot of housework that you have to do tonight, and you also have a big project that's due tomorrow. Both have to get done, and you think about how you'll handle it all. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: I think this will help me organize thoughtfully in the future.
I don't think I can manage all of these tasks.
I think this is too much work, but consider how nice it will feel when it is all done.
I hate feeling like I have so much to do, but I'll do my best to get it all done.
